assigned_to.description: Which agent (robot) is the task assigned to

phases.description: A dictionary of the states of the phases of the task. The keys (property names) are phase IDs, which are integers.

completed.description: An array of the IDs of completed phases of this task

active.description: The ID of the active phase for this task

pending.description: An array of the pending phases of this task

interruptions.description: A dictionary of interruptions that have been applied to this task. The keys (property names) are the unique token of the interruption request.

cancellation.description: If the task was cancelled, this will describe information about the request.

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the cancellation request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the cancel request

killed.description: If the task was killed, this will describe information about the request.

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the cancellation request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the kill request

events.description: A dictionary of events for this phase. The keys (property names) are the event IDs, which are integers.

skip_requests.description: Information about any skip requests that have been received

booking.description: Information about how a task was booked

id.description: The unique identifier for this task

labels.description: Information about how and why this task was booked

requester.description: (Optional) An identifier for the entity that requested this task

category.description: The category of this task or phase

detail.description: Detailed information about a task, phase, or event

estimate_millis.description: An estimate, in milliseconds, of how long the subject will take to complete

event_state.description: The current state of an event

name.description: The brief name of the event

deps.description: This event may depend on other events. This array contains the IDs of those other event dependencies.

items.description: The IDs of events that this event depends on. Event IDs are isolated within the scope of this task phase.

status.description: A simple token representing how the task is proceeding

dispatch.description: Information about how this task is being dispatched

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the interruption request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the purpose of the interruption

resumed_by.description: Information about the resume request that ended this interruption. This field will be missing if the interruption is still active.

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the resume request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the resume request

skip_phase_request.description: Information about a request to skip a phase

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the skip request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the purpose of the skip request

undo.description: Information about an undo skip request that applied to this request

unix_millis_request_time.description: The time that the undo skip request arrived

labels.description: Labels to describe the undo skip request
